name: Mission - #2ColorsGJ
description:
Mission is a little game made in 48h for the #2ColorsGJ. Assets and fx have been made by Lozul, music by Olivier Gasnault (made for the project).

A new UFO has been detected by a BOT of NASA. It is you, the spatial cloud ... You are a weapon, serving a superior intelligence, and your mission is to clear the Earth of its inhabitants.

To reach your objectif you will have to dodge the laser shoots from the humans. But you can catch their spacecrafts to gain a shield that will protect you for 1 second.

Game:

  • Dodge the lasers until the bar at the top of the screen is full
  • You have 3 levels of difficulties, more lasers, less health points

Controls:

  • Move with mouse
  • Activate shield with "spacebar"

Enjoy this game!

The #2ColorsGJ have been created by Bigaston, the objective is to create a game in 48h, with only 2 colors, and with the themes "You are the weapon" and "Space"
